converts a 4 byte array to an integer.

Parameters:
pb - byte array
bigEndian - endianness.
Returns:
an integer represented by 4 byte values.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if byte array size is not equal to 4

converts 4 bytes to an integer

Parameters:
b0 - first byte
b1 - second byte
b2 - third byte
b3 - forth byte
bigEndian - , if we want it in big endian format

toIntArray

public static int[] toIntArray(byte[] ba,
                               int amount,
                               boolean bigEndian)
Converts a byte array to an integer array. byte array length must be an order of 4.

Parameters:
ba - byte array
amount - amount of bytes to convert to int.
bigEndian - true if big endian.
Returns:
an integer array formed form byte array.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if amount is smaller than 4, larger than byte array, or not an order of 4.

toShortArray

public static short[] toShortArray(byte[] ba,
                                   int amount,
                                   boolean bigEndian)
Converts a byte array to a short array. byte array length must be an order of 2.

Parameters:
ba - byte array
amount - amount of bytes to convert to short.
bigEndian - true if big endian.
Returns:
a short array formed from byte array.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if amount is smaller than 4, larger than byte array, or not an order of 4.

toByteArray

public static byte[] toByteArray(short[] sa,
                                 int amount,
                                 boolean bigEndian)
Converts a given array of shorts to a byte array.

Parameters:
sa -
amount -
bigEndian -
Returns:
an array of bytes converted from the input array of shorts. 0xBABE becomes 0xBA, 0xBE (Big Endian) or 0xBE, 0xBA (Little Endian)
